short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show several language captions on Youtube at the same time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds checkboxes for each uploaded subtitle to Youtube video player, so you can watch them simultaneously.
Additionally, you can also add your own custom subtitles as srt-file in ⚙️"Settings" menu
